title: CHIME/FRB Alert
description: Fast radio burst alert from the Canadian Hydrogen Intensity Mapping Experiment.

known_source.description: Transient Name Server name of the known source (if a repeating FRB source)

trigger_time_inf_freq.description: Time of the trigger at infinite frequency [ISO 8601]

trigger_time_inf_freq_error.description: Error on the trigger time at infinite frequency [s]

sampling_time.description: Time resolution of the FRB search at the host observatory [ms]

importance.description: A machine learning score separating RFI (0) from an astrophysical signal (1)

association_probability.description: A score of known source association probability from poorly associated (0) to confidently associated (1)

npol.description: The number of polarizations of the real-time FRB search

tsys.description: The system temperature of the real-time FRB search [K]

update_message.description: Message to be included in an update alert

dm_gal_ne_2001_max.description: Estimated contribution to the dispersion measure [pc/cm^3] from the Galaxy using the NE2001 model.
